name: (All) is in home.
description:
Sunk in darkness, XXX awakens without any memory. In the dim light of their thoughts, a small flame will try to point they the way so that they discover what are they doing there, who are they and what's their destiny. And what they must leave behind.

Credits: 

game desing by Eduardo Ferry Diego Barrera

art direction by Cristobal Robles

3D models by Diego Barrera

game development by Rogelio Iturra

music by Felipe Gonzalez

game production by Diego Barrera
